hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Tuesday Orange - An Orange Flower
hiveArticle.body:
My today's entry for #colorchallenge by @kalemandra is an orange flower. This image was taken in Coorg, India.

<hr>

##### An Orange Flower

##### Camera : Nokia 6
